belongs_to_collection.name: Mrs. Brown's Boys: The Original Series

original_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: Believe It or Not
overview: Here she goes again, the formidable Agnes Brown trying to keep her chaotic family in order (forgetting of course that she is the cause of most of the chaos). In this, part three of the series, Agnes tries not to interfere (yeah right!) as she sees her daughter Cathy fall in love with a hunk of a detective Garda (Keith Duffy), but is all as it seems? Cathy's best friend, that sexy, shapely, slapper Sharon, doesn't think so.
title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: Believe It or Not
